import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Card from '../UI/Card'; import './Transaction.css'; import axios from '../../util/axios'; import APIContext from '../../store/API-context'; const Transaction = () => { const transactions = useContext(APIContext).transactions; const lastPage = transactions.slice(-8, transactions.length); // console.log(transactions); return (
latest transactions
{lastPage && lastPage.map(i => )}

User
Hotel
Room
Date
Price
Payment Method
Status
{i._id} {i.user.username} {i.hotel.name} {i.room.map(r => r.roomNumber).join(',')} {i.dateStart} - {i.dateEnd} ${i.price} {i.payment}
{i.status}
{/*
{1+(page-1)*tstLimit} - {page === totalPages ? transactions.length : tstLimit+(page-1)*tstLimit} of {transactions.length}
*/}
)} export default Transaction;
